text: Halldóra Briem (13 February 1913, Vestmannaeyjar - 21 October 1993, Stockholm) was the first Icelandic woman to study architecture. She studied architecture at the KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm, Sweden from 1935 to 1940. She would go on to work professionally in Sweden. ==References== Category:Icelandic women architects Category:20th-century Icelandic people Category:Icelandic architects Category:1913 births Category:1993 deaths
title: Halldóra Briem
